title: Pacific Peninsula - Now LIVE!
body:
**Dear Summoners,**

#Pacific Peninsula and it's team are proud to announce the launch of it's [website!](http://www.pacificpeninsula.net)

Please feel free to register on the website in preperation for the implementation of our tournament system, you will soon  be able to access many features such as:
1. Register as a player, and register a team on PP.net
2. Manage and create a team page
3. Participate and sign-up to events
4. Have a system for proof of win in-built to PP.net
5. Instant Messaging
6. Statistics and ladder system from tournament data
7. Monthly Tournaments

[www.pacificpeninsula.net](http://www.pacificpeninsula.net)

Thanks,

bollockz & the team at Pacific Peninsula

replies.body:
Awesome work dude just had a look at the site and it's looking good.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
